resources.string: Adults, please create your account first.\n Then create Family Accounts for kids.\n Be sure to link your Band or phone to the right account.
Presenting Sponsors Star Wars: Force for Change and Target
An unidentified problem occurred. Please contact technical support.
An internet connection is required. Please connect and try again.
Connection to Google failed. Please try again later.
Learn more, or have an account? Log in
Learn more, or Create a New Account
Sorry, that\'s taken. If this is you, Log in.
There\'s already an account with that name. If this is you, Log in.
There\'s already an account with that email. If this is you, Log in.
Do you need to set up kids with Family Accounts?
(You should only choose this option if you\'re the only person in your family with a new Kid Power Band)
If %s has an activity tracker, you should link it now.
Please hand your device to an adult or parent
Parents, please create an adult account first (must be older than 13 years old)
Got a Band?\n Let\'s get started!
Don\'t have a Band? Get one
Oops! Don\'t forget to create your username.
Hang on! Your username isn\'t verified yet.
Sorry, someone\'s already picked that name. Try another one.
Oops! Your username and password can\'t be blank.
Oops! Your username must be valid and your password can\'t be blank.
Oops! Your password can\'t be blank.
Oops! Your email and date of birth can\'t be blank.
Oops! Your email must be valid and date of birth can\'t be blank.
Select the matching Band ID below
Tap your Band to see\n your Band Id
Which Band do you want to\n link to %s?
Don\'t see your Band?\n Make sure it\'s charged, powered on, then Search again
Uh oh! Bluetooth is disabled on this phone. Go to settings and enable it to link or sync your Band.
No Bands found. Make sure your Band is charged, powered on and nearby, then search again.
Oops! The connection dropped. Please try linking again later.
Oops! The connection dropped. Make sure your Band is charged, powered on and nearby, then try linking again.
Uh oh! Linking failed. Make sure your Band is charged, powered on and nearby, then try again.\n Need help
This activity tracker is attached to another user!
Your Band wasn\'t found! Make sure it\'s charged, powered on and nearby, then try again.
Sync failed because the connection to your Band dropped! Make sure it\'s charged, powered on and nearby, then try again.
Uh oh! Sync failed. Make sure your Band is charged, powered on and nearby, then try again.
Uh oh! Sync failed. Make sure your Band is charged, powered on and nearby, then try again.\n Need help?
If %s is a child, go get them now to start their first Mission...
You created an account, but you\'re not counting steps yet. To start %s\'s first Mission, link their activity tracker from the Passport.
Trouble logging in? Reset your password
Sorry, we didn\'t recognize that login. Please try again or reset your password.
Adult, please create your username.\n (up to 12 characters)\n Please don\'t use your real name.
Please create your username.\n (up to 12 characters)\n Please don\'t use your real name.
Create a username\n (Please don\'t use a real name.)
Sorry, that name is already taken.\n Please try again.
Username is required. Please input the username.
Please only use letters, numbers, and spaces in your username.
Email is required. Please input the email.
Sorry, that\'s not a valid email address.
Password should be at least 6 characters.
Whoops! Pick a profile image first.
Uh oh! Please enter your birthday.
Uh oh! Please enter valid birthday.

Before finishing %s\'s account, please create a Parent account with…
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Don\'t have a UNICEF Kid Power Band?
To use your new Cheers, pick one of your friends and tap Cheer.
To send it, pick one of your friends and tap Cheer.
Congratulations! You\'ve completed all available Missions. New Missions will appear here as they become available.
Missions will appear here as you complete them.
No Bands found.\n Please make sure your Band is charged and powered on, then try again.
Band not found.\n Please make sure your band is charged and powered on, then try again.
No Bluetooth service.\n Please make sure Bluetooth is enabled.
This activity tracker is attached to another user!
Failed to connect Google fit. Please check network conneciton.
You\'re getting closer to earning your next Power Point. Go get active and come back to sync soon!
Google Fit is connected, but no steps have been recorded in at 48 hours.
If that doesn\'t seem right, check out some reasons your tracker might not be reporting to our app.\n\nRead More.
(If that doesn\'t seem right, read more.)
Earn Power Points at a faster rate when you go on Missions.
Before you start a mission, link your activity tracker.
Please complete your current mission before starting a new mission.
You can\'t unlock a mission now
Before unlocking a mission you need to purchase credit from the Passport screen by clicking on Credit.
You need at least one credit to unlock this Mission
"In-app purchases are disabled. Please check your Google Play account and phone settings."
Each mission costs one credit.\n Each credit costs $3.99
Each mission costs one credit.\n Each credit costs %s

Make an impact upon the lives of kids in Far Eastern Nepal, and learn about Nepalese culture.
Are you sure you want to reset your password? [Cancel / Reset Password]
We sent an email to reset your password for %s. Follow the instructions to reset your password, then come back here.
We sent an email to reset your password for %s. Follow the instructions to reset your password. Remember to use your new password next time you log in.
We sent an email to reset your password. Follow the instructions to reset your password, then come back here.
This will un-link your Kid Power Band from this account. You will need to re-link it to continue syncing.
Missions cost one credit. You have %d credits.
As you get active and sync your activity, your progress and achievements are automatically added to your Travel Log.
Are you sure you want to block
Are you sure you want to unblock
Sorry, we couldn\'t find anyone by that username.
Click \"Follow Someone\" below to get started.\n People you follow will be listed here.
People who follow you will show up here.\n When you follow others, they\'ll be able to see that you\'re following them.
Setup Kid Power Accounts for your whole family from Family Accounts. Afterwards, they\'ll each be listed here.\n \n To get started, please verify you are 18 or over.

You haven\'t created any Family Accounts yet.\n \n Family Accounts are the easiest way to set up kids and other users with their own account. For Family Accounts aged under 13, you will receive their e-mail updates. All your Family Accounts will be listed here. To sync another user, log out, then log in as that user.
UNICEF Kid Power gives you the power to save lives.\n \n To learn more, visit unicefkidpower.org
Rank by total Power Points in the last 7 days
In a pickle? We\'re here to help.

Hi, I'm a Kid Power user and I have a question:
 
 
 
 
 
 %s / Android (%s)
Including your recent app logs will help us help you.
With your Kid Power Band or connected device, go on Missions hosted by Kid Power Champions to learn about new countries, get active, and save lives
Get active by running, walking or doing your favorite activity. Even dancing will earn Power Points!
To see your Power Points rack up, sync your activity every day using the Kid Power App
Your Points unlock fun souvenirs along the way - and most importantly, lifesaving food packets for malnourished kids
Start a Mission by watching the briefing video. Then get active, earn points, and sync your activity to unlock souvenirs and packets of therapeutic food
We never track or store your physical location, but your Kid Power Band requires access to sync using Bluetooth.
To Sync with band, Kid Power needs access to the LOCATION permission.
Kid Power does not have the LOCATION permission to sync with band.
To get the best support, enable storage access to include your logs.
To send logs, Kid Power needs access to the STORAGE permission.
Kid Power does not have the STORAGE permission to access your logs.
Now you\'re ready to finish setting up the account for
(use a Kid Power Band or your own device)
Start saving lives with\nUNICEF Kid Power
Learn more or get a Kid Power Band
To participate in UNICEF Kid Power, the Kid Power app needs to get your steps from a hardware device that counts steps.
There are two ways to start counting steps:
You can buy a Kid Power Band online
buy a Kid Power Band online
2) A device connected to Google Fit

Google Fit is a free app by Google which is sort of the \"Grand Central Station\" for all your activity data. You can use this %s to track steps in Google Fit, or even most 3rd-party activity trackers.\nGet Google Fit on the Play Store.
Get Google Fit on the Play Store.
What activity data does Kid Power use?
The Kid Power app only accesses steps and calories.
Yes, your data is never shared with any 3rd parties for any reason, now or ever.
Yes, at any time. On this %s, tap Menu > Settings > Google Fit Data > Connected Apps > Kid Power
Menu > Settings > Google Fit Data > Connected Apps > Kid Power
Set up an activity tracker later
To authorize Kid Power to get steps from Google Fit, please enable setting in Google Fit Settings.
You created an account, but you\'re not counting steps yet. To start %s\'s first Mission, link their activity tracker from the Passport.
Link an activity tracker to participate
%s\'s Kid Power account is setup to get steps from Google Fit.
%s\'s Kid Power account is setup to get steps from HealthKit.
%s\'s Kid Power account is setup to get steps from this Kid Power Band.
You haven\'t linked an activity tracker
Oops! There is no tracker linked now. Please try again later.
This will un-link Google Fit from this account. You\'ll need to re-link it to continue syncing.
This will un-link HealthKit from this account. You\'ll need to re-link it to continue syncing.
Now you can participate by connecting to Google Fit - even without a Kid Power Band.
Google Fit can count steps with this device or another activity tracker.
or Link a Kid Power Band, or buy one
(You successfully connected your Android device to Google Fit, but your steps were lower than expected when Syncing.)
Whenever you\'re using this %s or an activity tracker to get steps into Google Fit, that device needs to be carried with you, charged up and turned on.

Kid Power needs permission to get steps from Google Fit, but it may have been revoked. Check that Kid Power has permission by launching Menu > Settings > Google Fit Data > Connected Apps. If you don\'t see Kid Power listed it means that permission was revoked. Android requires that you delete and re-install the Kid Power app to re-authorize it.
Your %s or activity tracker needs permission to put steps into Google Fit, but it may have been revoked.
Check that this %s still has permission by going to Google Fit > Settings.\nUnder Google Fit Data, make sure \"Activity detection\" is turned on.

If you\'re using an activity tracker like a Jawbone or Misfit, go to Menu > Settings > Google Fit Data > Connected Apps and make sure your activity tracker\'s app is listed.\nIf you don\'t see it, re-install it from the Play Store.
Didn\'t solve it? Get in touch!
Menu > Settings > Google Fit Data > Connected Apps
Your Kid Power account is setup to get steps from HealthKit on the %s. To continue using HealthKit to get steps, please Sync on that device.
Your Kid Power account is setup to get steps from Google Fit on the %s Android device. To continue using Google Fit to get steps, please Sync on that device.
If you replaced or restored the %s Android device, the Kid Power app needs to be re-linked to Google Fit.
If you replaced or restored the %s, the Kid Power app needs to be re-linked to Google Fit.
To re-link the Kid Power app to Google Fit, visit More > Profile > Activity Tracker and un-link Google Fit, then re-link it.
To re-link the Kid Power app to Google Fit, visit More > Profile > Activity Tracker and un-link HealthKit, then re-link to Google Fit.
Switch to a Kid Power Band
To get steps using a Kid Power Band instead of Google Fit, visit your Activity Tracker page in More > Profile > Activity Tracker and un-link Google Fit, then link your new Kid Power Band.
